titles.title: STATES 2.0 Act
STATES 2.0 Act
Strengthening the Tenth Amendment Through Entrusting States 2.0 Act
To amend the Controlled Substances Act to provide for a new rule regarding the application of the Act to marijuana, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the Committee on Energy and Commerce, and in addition to the Committees on the Judiciary, and Transportation and Infrastructure, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.
